item.title: Example Complicated Recipe
item.description: This is an example recipe with multiple instruction sets.

item.title: Example Freeform Recipe
item.description: You can just ignore the special stuff and just type out your recipe. Cook time: 20 minutes Yield: 1 serving Ingredients 1 slice - bread 1 tbsp - peanut butter Directions Toast the bread (yes! toast it!) Apply peanut butter Eat Notes See https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet for more instructions on how to format pages.

item.title: Example Recipe With Embeds
item.description: The text down here at the bottom ends up in the top of the resulting page. Use it as a description, as background, for images, or to link in a Youtube video. Formatting You can use Markdown formatting! Images Upload the image to the static/images folder, then embed it like this: Video Videos can be embedded like this:

item.title: Example Simple Recipe
item.description: This is an example recipe with one instruction set. The text down here at the bottom ends up in the top of the resulting page. Use it as a description, as background, for images, or to link in a Youtube video.
